summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Palmer's price was initially low at the start because nobody expected him to have that kind of impact and numbers.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Palmer was brilliant last season and was a shining light. I think you have to decide if you're going to capture him for the first few weeks.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Saka has the momentum from his Euros performance and is expected to be a key player.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Saka is a premium pick and can deliver big points.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: You cannot start the season without Haaland in your team. He's a massive priority.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: You cannot not have him, he’s the most expensive player ever in FPL for a reason.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Foden is a great option for getting into City's attack.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Foden could be a good investment if he performs well in the pre-season.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Saliba had a fantastic Euros and is expected to be a key defender this season.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Saliba is a must-have at his price point, given his performance.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Richarlison could be a valuable player if he starts regularly.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: He's an option to consider if he secures a place in Spurs' starting lineup.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Havertz is transitioning from forward to midfielder, making him a potentially versatile pick.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: If he starts regularly, Havertz could provide good value in the midfield.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Isak is expected to be a strong attacking asset this season.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: If Newcastle's fixtures look good, Isak could be a great pickup.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: He could be an interesting pick based on his pre-season performance.

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: There’s potential for him to be utilized in an attacking role.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Trippier remains a valuable fantasy asset due to his attacking potential.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: At 6.5 million, he offers great value if he backs up his attacking output.
